articles.title: Who am I?
articles.description: \> Some additional details about the website
articles.contents:
I’m a Social Data Scientist with a background in Political Science, applied quantitative methods, causal inference, and programming in .
A former PhD student at the Department of Political Science (UCPH), I currently work as a consultant/analyst/data scientist for a private Danish consultancy firm.
Recently, I’ve been focusing on spatial data analysis 🗺️, data visualization 📊, and sports analytics ⚽.
Have a look at some of my various data visualizations 📊
… and my  #TidyTuesday commits 📈
I have also published (or am working on) a few  packages 📦
You can check out my resumé  here (download here)


Skills
